page.title: 18BOARDING SCHOOL LIFE CONT.
page.content: ACCORDING TO AGE;THE JUNIORS' LIGHTS ARE PUT OUT BY THE MATRONS AT 8.30PM BUT THE FIFTH FORM STAY UP UNTIL 10PM. THE SIXTH FORM LIVE IN A DIFFERENT HOUSE ACROSS THE GROUNDS.AT WEEKENDS ACTIVITIES SUCH AS SWIMMING OR CINEMA TRIPS ARE PROVIDED BY TEACHERS BUT THEY ARE OPTIONAL.ON SATURDAY MORNINGS WE ARE ALLOWED TO GO SHOPPING IN BATTLE BUT WE ALSO HAVE TO GO TO CHOIR AND GAMES' PRACTICE AND WE MUST CLEAN OUR SHOES.ON SUNDAY MORNINGS WE GO TO THE PARISH CHURCH,AFTER WHICH WE WRITE A LETTER TO OUR PARENTS.ON SUNDAY AFTERNOONS,WE CAN GO OUT WITH FRIENDS OR RELATIVES, OR GO FOR WALKS AROUND THE GROUNDS,OR PLAY GAMES.WE GET UP & GO TO BED HALF AN HOUR LATER AT WEEKENDS, BUT MEALS, EXCEPT BREAKFAST,ARE AT THE SAME TIMES. IF WE ARE ILL,WE GO TO MALT-QUEUE WHERE WE SEE SISTER & PERHAPS STAY IN THE SAN.
